title: Spelt salad with kale, carrots and onions
ingredients: ['525g uncooked spelt', '2L water', '1 red pepper, finely chopped', '2 carrots, finely chopped', '100g thinly sliced and chopped red cabbage', '1/2 red onion, finely chopped', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '100ml olive oil', '50ml balsamic vinegar', '2 lemons, zested and juiced', '225g kale, torn into small pieces', 'salt and pepper']
